pr_title: Various Simplification to Map Making tools

timeline.message:
Remove file menu from map creator window

- The window is easy enough to close by clicking the window's 'X' icon
Rename "run map creator" button to "map creator tools"
Extract map maker panel construction to factory classes

Simplify map maker UI and tool instantiation

1) Tools are no longer used as CLI, the args list is always
  empty, we can thus simplify the 'handleArgs' methods of each
  of the tools classes.

2) Extract common functionality to get map location from system
 property to a 'MapFolderSystemProperty' class.

3) Simplify how buttons are created, use JButtonBuilder
